@Raidacus Agreed. He should at least get the daughter pregnant. Best, is to get her pregnant and tell her to not tell her parents who the father is, then after she graduates or leaves school, get married to her. Her parents won't find out until it's too late; just their reactions should be worth 15 years of loneliness. Stealing someones girl is one thing, but taking their daughter and having your baby is 10 times worse.

The story is fine and all, but you know what? He still got NTR'd. Nothing he ever does change the fact that he got his girl, who supposedly seemed to genuinely love him (and whose reason for cheating might as well be some ridiculous NTR bullshit anyway, although she might've just been a bitch) to his supposed best friend. It doesn't change the fact that he took his girl and actually married her and had a girl with her and he stayed single and bitter for at least 15 years and that, even to this day, he loves her.

I really wish there was a sequel where he meets the parents as their son-in-law and maybe even steal back the girl, but only as a fuck toy because she ain't worth being serious about her anymore.

NTR with revenge, this one is good. The MC got NTRed and has a chance to get revenge to the daughter. This story is so bittersweet. And that damn ending, the MC still can't forget that woman. This author published some good stuff.

Still at least the MC got some type of revenge and the art is great !!!

That went weirdly different to what I was expecting to happen. His words don't fully match the scenes, as in, he was talking all about "breaking her" but there was little violence and very little resistance from the daughter there. Add how we don't know whether she's single or has a boyfriend, there is absolutely no symmetry in the story here. Here I was expecting him to get triggered by the similarities between his cheating girlfriend and the daughter and just go apeshit on her but no that actually went smoother than most vanilla stories you see here.
This definitely needs a continuation cause this doesn't make a lot of sense.

To much to little, this isn't really revenge since by the end he realises that he still in love with her mother or at least the image of her. The problem is we don't know why her mother cheated on him in the first place, given the hentai logic on this one i'm just going to assume some kinda of blackmail like " I videotaped you 2 holding hands now sleep with me" was involved. This story could definitely use a sequel to explain a few things instead of leaving us speculating all bloodborne style.
This made me happy for some reason. Sweet revenge is quite an appropriate term to use for this situation. The girl liked him anyway so it is nice.
